name: Plump & Pout Lip Balm and Lip Gloss Set
about: What it is:.Highlighted Ingredients:.....Ingredient Callouts:...This Set Contains:....
ingredients: -MAXI-LIP‚Ñ¢: Scientifically and clinically shown to visibly increase lip volume by 40 percent and decrease the appearance of wrinkling by 29 percent..-Shea Butter: Hydrates and soothes the lips..-Hyaluronic Acid: Makes lips feels pillowy soft....Rosy Outlook:..Polybutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Tetraisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methylstyrene/Indene Copolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Isostearyl Isostearate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Glycerin, Water, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Octyldodecanol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Menthoxypropanediol, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Flavor, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Nicotinate, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Isostearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Phenoxyethanol, Lactic Acid. May Contain: Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased....Pink Marshmallow:...Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Synthetic Beeswax, Diisostearyl Malate, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Octyldodecanol, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Microcrystalline Wax, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), C18-21 Alkane, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Butter, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Flavor, Tocopheryl Nicotinate, Jojoba Esters, Menthoxypropanediol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Tribehenin, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Benzotriazolyl Dodecyl p-Cresol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sorbitan Isostearate, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Polyglycerin-3, Glycerin, Water, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Lactic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol. May Contain/Peut contenir: Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Wear them alone for the perfect kiss of color or layer together for a visibly plumping boost!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's not worth the money I paid for this at all. Did not do anything other than provide some shine, if I wanted shine only I would have bought a cheaper lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feel and smells nice, product packaging is cute too. However makes ur lips SUPER DRY.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! It looks amazing with my lip liner. It fills in those lines in your lips. It‚Äôs gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lawless lip balm and gloss and night mask. I use mask every night and lip balm and gloss for over 8 weeks and it really has taken my lips to another level.   Love it so much.   It is the best lip care products I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Glad I got this before the it sold out! It‚Äôs super pale but works well when I have a full make up on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try these for a while, but I don't usually like plumping lippies that much. Thankfully, I don't notice it with either. Both are comfortable and moisturising. I think this is a great deal for two full sized products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 5/5 I love the lip balm, and I'll be buying that again. I do feel like it makes my lips more hydrated and plump. It has the right amount of slip and staying power for me. It also holds up well in the tube in the heat (so far). I wouldn't say it's my favorite balm though. It does have a feel to it on the lips, and I prefer to not feel my lip products at all except for that hydrating wet feel. However, it is the only truly plumping balm in a chapstick delivery system, which is my preferred method of application plus the plumping I desperately need and hardly anyone does both. 3/5 Stars on the lip gloss. It has a thick feel on the lips that I can't get over. I feel like I get bum ring lips as it starts to soak in/dry up. However, I do appreciate the glass lip look as well as the plumping effect it gives me. It's not a burning, it is a cooling plump, and it is definitely more than the lip balm. I do have 2 major issues with the packaging though... 1) There's hardly any actual product in the tube. I was able to use it literally a handful of times before it was gone. That's just disrespectful. 2) Sooooo much product comes out on the doe foot that I feel like it gets all over the component and all up in my mouth because I unintentionally apply too much. That's just rude.

reviews.review_title: Love the product but feels sus
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cons: The gloss is defo not filled all the way. Missing probably 30% of product. As someone else pointed out the description says ‚ÄúFull size .05 oz‚Äù but I‚Äôm holding a new box of the Velvet color version and it‚Äôs .11 fl oz. Idk if this is a typo or accident but considering multiple people are saying they‚Äôre missing product I‚Äôm thinking they‚Äôre actually cheating you out of product. Full-size container but not a full product. Very disappointing and feels gross from a company.   Pros: it‚Äôs SO SAD that this was my introduction to Lawless and I absolutely loved the product. The gloss smooths out lines as advertised and has a nice cooling affect (nothing extreme or tingly). Even bought another color of the gloss before I looked more into it. I see some saying the balm is hard and it is more stiff than a Carmex but I like it. Application is more deliberate, can‚Äôt overdo it, more matte and natural finish that lasts. But considering the sus situation I‚Äôm weary of continuing to buy Lawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This set is completely misleading describing what you will receive. In the ‚ÄúDetails‚Äù section, it lists that the gloss is ‚ÄúFULL SIZE‚Äù at 0.5 oz but their regular FULL size gloss is 0.11 oz. This is light weight scam no!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The set is clear. Lip gloss is nice and thick but clear. Lipbalm is a fail to me as it is so basic and meh and I'm shocked at the price of it alone. It is stiff and takes some warming up on the lips but even then it just felt meh to me. I would recommend the gloss as it is my fav.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lip balm is hard to get a lot of product from it‚Äôs okay tho and the gloss is good I‚Äôve gotten multiple of them before but this one was very empty.

reviews.review_title: Love this set, especially the lip gloss
reviews.review_text: I can attest to what everyone is saying about the quantity of lip gloss in the container but the lip gloss itself and the lip balm are great, so still giving this 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The lip balm sucks and the lip gloss barely has any product in it. I liked the way the lip gloss felt though but I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth it to get the set. The price point is too high for what you receive considering the lip balm does absolutely nothing for your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past few weeks I live it! It hydrates my lips while additionally plumping them and the formula isn‚Äôt sticky and dosent bother me at all. I will definitely be rebuying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this set. The lip balm is mediocre and the gloss is pretty sticky and basic. You also get very little product in the tube. I will be returning this tomorrow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lip balm too sticky to wear on its own, it‚Äôs like you must wear it with the lip gloss‚Ä¶ the lip gloss barely has any product in it, little pigment. Poor packaging, my other gloss wouldn‚Äôt keep close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try these both and was lucky to get this during the sale. The pink marshmallow is a shear pink, it felt smooth and left my lips looking moisturized. It had a slight fruity smell which I really enjoyed. The lip plump was also really amazing and I was so glad to get it in the set (it is full size). I was hesitant to buy it separately though because all the reviews had said you don‚Äôt get much in the container which is probably going to be true. But the deal you are basically get two for the price of  one. It was a great lip oil/plump. It did not burn or tingle really bad, it was just sort of a cooling sensation. It made my lips so glossy and moisturized, I absolutely loved the two paired together. I think I‚Äôm going to order another set while the sale is still going on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So these are both full size, but I do agree about the plumping gloss being particularly full. I have a few of lawless plumping gloss and none look like the one I received in this set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this today in the mail , and I can‚Äôt tell if the product was used or if it is expected to be missing product?  I have not put this in my lips because who knows what happened there.  That said, because of this I will be returning it, I don‚Äôt feel safe using this. What a disappointment, I can‚Äôt even replacement because it is out of stock . This is not the first time I received

reviews.review_title: I don't think the gloss is full?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula but I received an item that looks half full. I am a bit dissapointed and I will unfortunately return the set...

reviews.review_title: Fun way to try these products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There seems to be some confusion about the size of these products - they are both full size. My lipgloss does have significant gaps showing in it though. This is my first experience with this gloss so I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs typical of the full size that‚Äôs sold individually as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much! Makes my lips glossy and fuller! My most hydrating and comfortable gloss. The lip balm is spectacular

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss only comes less than half full. Not a full size, the full size is 0.11, this is not it . The size is more like a sample size and the gloss bottle is less than half full. I will need to return. The balm chapstick isbasically

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Y‚ÄôALLL. in case you are wondering they are both full size. I went in store to just get the cherry vanilla lip gloss but i saw they had this FULL SIZED two pack for $32. insane. definitely one of my favorite glosses
